property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the PreflightBookOption (a Application or Book).

property.name: preflightScope
property.shortdesc: The pages or documents to preflight, specified either as an enumeration or a string. To specify a range, separate page numbers in the string with a hyphen (-). To specify separate pages, separate page numbers in the string with a comma (,). Can return: PreflightScopeOptions enumerator or String.

property.name: preflightIncludeObjectsOnPasteboard
property.shortdesc: If true, include objects on pasteboard when preflighting.

property.name: preflightIncludeNonprintingObjects
property.shortdesc: If true, include objects that do not print when preflighting.

property.name: preflightProfilePolicy
property.shortdesc: The policy for preflighting applied when opening a document or book, whether to use embedded profile or the another profile when the preflight is turned on.

property.name: preflightWorkingProfile
property.shortdesc: The working preflight profile. Can return: PreflightProfile or String.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the PreflightBookOption.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
